short_description: The READ_N_PINS node allows you to measure and output voltages from Flexiforce sensors using a Phidget InterfaceKit.

parameters.name: default
parameters.description: Default value to be used if no input is connected to the node, by default None

parameters.name: n_sensors
parameters.description: Defines the number of pressure sensors connected to the Phidget InterfaceKit.

returns.description: The output of the node is a list of voltages measured from the sensors.
